text: General Edwin Hess Burba Jr. (born September 13, 1936) is a retired four-star general. He was Commander-In-Chief of the United States Army Forces Command (FORSCOM) from 1989 to 1993.The National Guardsman, Volumes 24-25, 1970, page 33 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Oklahoma Category:People from McAlester, Oklahoma
title: Edwin H. Burba Jr.
